titleStmt.title: Tamiḻneṟi Viḷakkam 23.
Experimenting with formatting for the final edition.

body.head: Commentary
body.p: kai yaṭai mutal ākat talaimakaḷ kūṟṟīṟākac collap paṭṭaṉa varaivu maṟuttuḻi yākiya vuṭaṉ celavām eṉṟa vāṟu.

div.p: eṉpatu naṟṟāykkuc collic cevili piṉ ceṉṟatu.
eṉpatu cevili iṭaic curattu varuvārai viṉāyiṟṟu.
eṉpatu ceviliyai yiṭaic curattuk kaṇṭōr teruṭṭiyatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaṭamar piṉ cellak kaṇṭār colliyatu.
eṉpatu talaimakaṭamar ātal aṟintu talaimakaṉ maṟaintatu.

standOff.note: I cannot make sense of the variants and they are not reported in the apparatus in Wilden 2010, which leads me to think this is corrupt. The eḻuttu vu looks similar to ā and ḷa closely resembles ṉa. This seems like a simple copying error.
